application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of details of an enhanced sound insulation value DnT,w + Ctr [and L'nT,w] of at least 5dB above the Building Regulations value, for the floor/ceiling/wall structures separating different types of rooms/ uses in adjoining dwellings, namely [eg. living room and kitchen above bedroom of separate dwelling], pursuant to Condition 6; details of a preliminary risk assessment report, pursuant to Condition 8; details of a site investigation scheme, pursuant to Condition 9; details of a quantitative risk assessment report, pursuant to Condition 10; details of a remediation method statement, pursuant to Condition 11; details of a verification report, pursuant to Condition 12; details of an onward long-term monitoring methodology report, pursuant to Condition 13 of planning permission reference: 2022/01354/FUL dated 21st August 2024.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
